name: NATIONAL RESTAURANT ASSOCIATION
description: Advocate on behalf of more than 500,000 restaurant businesses across the United States.
sampleDescriptions: Implementation by the Small Business Administration of the Restaurant Revitalization Fund, emergency assistance for eligible restaurants, bars, and other qualifying businesses impacted by COVID-19.
